Text:
I hope people will seed this as long as possible. This is the ultimate Blade Runner Soundtrack, and it would be a shame if it "disappeared"...

Keep seeding! :)
According to audiochecker, this is FLAC-recoded MPEG.
This is insane. Thanks a million.

The CDs are provided as one big flac each. Damn!
Could you split them up into the diferent songs?

Use this software to split the files:

http://www.medieval.it/cuesplitter-pc/menu-id-71.html

Regards from uploader ;)
